name: Colonization Redirect
description:
On colonization and the importance of proper paperwork and software gore.

Due to a current bug in the Colonization Services application page, incorrectly formatting your destination (bringing up the handy #400 error) has a very slight chance of changing your destination to the widely maligned Deathworld #400. Our Dev-AIs are still tracking down the bug but have assured us that the probability is minuscule, and that surely the reports saying otherwise are just overblown :)

A game of chance and figuring out how to maximize the short-term Cumulative Happiness Index of your planet. No worries though, as the Suffering Index has since been deprecated, making your job much easier and less depressing.

Click tiles to guide colonists towards marginally better landing sites

Press R to renounce responsibility for these careless application fillers. 

------

Created for Bolt Jam #5
